Package tethys.tasks

Class ExportDatablockGroup

java.lang.Object
offlineProcessing.OfflineTaskGroup
tethys.tasks.TethysTaskGroup
tethys.tasks.ExportDatablockGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
PamSettings, SettingsNameProvider
public class ExportDatablockGroup extends TethysTaskGroup
Detections handler already has a very system for looping through data which is a bit different to the standard one in offline task, so an going to override the main background function and do it our own way!
Author:
dg50
